desc:
On the crossroads of two wealthy kingdoms lies a merchant
path which has been used by decades. Travellers of all kinds
have been passing carrying their goods to neighbouring
towns, ofter seeking refuge or new beginning.
Then, people started to dissapear, even whole
caravans sometimes found deserted, travellers robbed...
or murdered. Ones that escaped told stories about evil creatures from the hill, inhabited inside an ancient keep in top of the very hill. Two kingdoms decided to shut down the route in order to protect roaming travellers. But, of course, this was not a solution. It's up to you, eager adventurers, to hunt down and bring down to justice these evil foes, and all that come in your way.

name: campaign_citadel
title: Bandit's catch
descShort:
There is a menace currently in the capital city of Brightlight.
No one knowns what or who is responsible for a robbery
 involving artefacts and precious gems from the citadel's
royal treasury. At first, it seemed like a typical gnome deed,
 but after princess Celestwin's dissapearance, something deeper
is definitely involved. If only the stewart of the citadel...

name: campaign_tomb
title: Paladin's Tomb
descShort:
There are rumors that old graveyard on top of the hills of
 Stribor hides lost treasure of Svetoslav, a bold paladin in
 Samuil's service centuries ago. Is this a truth or
 just a fairytale, there is only one way to find out.
But beware, no one is ever returned from the Stribor's vaults!
